item.title: What is common between Stroke and Fraud ?
item.description: The stroke prediction and fraud detection in the data science are similar because there are very few positive occurrences in the dataset. This is also called imbalanced data. I would go through step by step process below to make things simple. After doing the initial exploratory analysis; it can be seen that there are 201 missing values in the bmi column. This was filled using the median values.
